website_summaries.verdict: This best-selling option is both easy to set up and break down and features an attractive bull's-eye design.
pros: Available in several sizes, starting at 10 ft. wide, 5.4 ft. high, and 6 ft. deep
Sets up and breaks down within a few minutes
cons: Doesn't include a hitting pad of any kind
Some reports of fragile support rods
Others found that balls went through the net too easily

customer_reviews.title: Great product at an exceptional price!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, easy to set up and put away, exactly what I was looking for in an inexpensive home driving range net, fantastic both indoors and outdoors. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: William C Cook Jr

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying my backyard practice sessions. I will admit, however, that it took me almost two hours to set it up. I would have liked a more step-by-step set of instructions. Part of the problem might be that I am in Az. and am using it on desert landscaping. Overall, it's strong enough to handle my driver, holds up in the wind, gives a nice bulls-eye target and collects all shots. It's been only a week in use so if it lasts, I'll be very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: tarsal36

customer_reviews.title: Pretty easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to put together, it is similar to a tent. Pretty sturdy. I take it down when Im done using it. It folds up back into the bag fairly easily as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this last week since golf courses are closed. Reviews seemed fine. Got it today, set it up (with help from my wife since it’s very difficult for one person) and started hitting. After about 5 hits, the mesh backing ripped from the black base. I would expect that from something that costs less than half of what this did, but no way should this happen. Awful product if you plan on hitting real balls. You HAVE to use practice balls or it will rip.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Good net, easy setup, easy breakdown
customer_reviews.text: has held up so far. easy to setup, easy to break down, appears to be decent quality netting for the price. has a high arch to handle 72 degree wedge. Big fan so far and I think it'll hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Simpfenderfer

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up and reliable net
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the Galileo Golf Net last week and received prior to some company coming in for weekend. One of our guests is learning the game and it gave us some time in improving his ball contact, posture and balance. With the bullseye on the back drop it gave him a sense of launch angle from club/ball contact. Working well to keep the swing active.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup, love being able to have it indoors.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this a couple of weeks. Started outdoors and moved it inside this last rainy weekend. I’m happy with it. Pretty easy to set up, I kinda scrunch it up at night to fit the cars in the garage. I set a bucket on each end to hold it that way. I’ve probably hit 200 shots into it so far and haven’t seen any issues. I love the depth to it because I typically hit the ball pretty high.
customer_reviews.author: BaileysBiz

customer_reviews.title: Stands well
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it a few times but all seems to work well. It was a little awkward to set up solo but it can still be done.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The product was as advertised. The customer service is beyond all expectations. I had the net set up and had used it a number of times when a wet heavy snow storm hit. One of the rods broke because of the weight of the snow. I thought that was the end of the golf net. I contacted the customer service of Galileo to see if I could buy a new rod. Tara asked for the information on my purchase and sent the rod at no cost. The net is back up. I can't praise the way I was treated high enough - it was outstanding!
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Great even with wind
customer_reviews.text: First setup took me a few minutes to figure it out and afterwards it was easy, stays up even with moderate wind. Very good net for backyards, kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kzreik

customer_reviews.title: THIS NET IS AMAZING!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this net, Galileo makes an amazing net. When I hit the ball usually it goes about 350 yards with my driver. And when I used the net it didn’t tear which was very important to me.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Need a hitting net? Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my boyfriend who is rebuilding his golf game after a few years of back issues. It gives him the opportunity to work on his swing at leisure with convenience. It was super easy to put together and stops a golf ball.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Miller

customer_reviews.title: Weak straps, not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t that difficult to setup, just like a small tent really. But about the 30th ball, one of the straps that goes to the ground pin tore and the entire thing collapsed. I’ve now hand sown all 4 anchor points but not sure how long that will last.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is nothing more than a standard China issued net that could be bought for $35. I was expecting a higher quality for the money. It was a complete pain to set-up because the poles were constantly unhinging because they don't lock well enough. Instructions were far less than ideal. The "bullseye" has this plastic stuff on it from the screen printing and it only partially comes off. Once it was up taking 2 grown ass adults 30 minutes it kept falling over in the light wind. If it was $30 then I would just be ok with it, but for over $80 it just flat out needs to be better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It works OK. I have used it several times with plastic practice golf balls and real golf balls. Storing it assembled is a little inconvenient, and it blows over easily in windy conditions. The stakes included are not good for my application since I am using it on the driveway. I may cut a broom handle to provide a "spreader" on both sides with clips to attach to the rings at the pole ends to keep it standing.
customer_reviews.author: slowbutshure

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good looking item, but incredibly poorly made. It BROKE while we were assembling it. The long poles that go through the nylon are flimsy at best. Now we have a crying 12 year old boy who is crushed and hoping for a replacement soon. Let's hope the second net works better and it arrives quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Bear

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed about quality
customer_reviews.text: We put this together easily-took about 10 hits and it is essentially decimated. The target split from the netting. The target and the netting have holes after about 20 minutes of use. Not okay to pay $100 for something and then only get to use it for 20 minutes before it's completely broken.
customer_reviews.author: Codilind21

customer_reviews.title: Winner winner chicken dinner
customer_reviews.text: In this time of staying home all day, every day, you can’t beat this hitting net. Of course, it helps to have a yard. So far so good but it’s challenging to assemble until you’ve done it few times. Well, I’ve had this net for about a month so far and everything is still good. This was a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Shogun

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fun to use!
customer_reviews.text: This net is so easy and fun to use! It sets up quickly and stays in place with easy ground stakes. I had used it a few times, taking it down after every use, but one time, I left it up for a few days and when I when out one morning, I found that one of the corded poles had broken. I contacted the company via email and they responded right away. They sent me replacement poles free of charge in just a few days! Great net and great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: PMH

customer_reviews.title: instructions are difficult
customer_reviews.text: The instructions to assemble this are very hard to understand. The product itself is a very good product once assembly is figured out. I got a quick update from Galileo on the assembly. It was clearer and I was able to follow it. The net is a very good practise aid.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Derfler

customer_reviews.title: Great Net For Hitting Golf Balls
customer_reviews.text: I bought the net during the Covid-19 shut down. My daughter is a high school golfer and I am 0 handicap tournament player so we practice quite a bit. This solved our problems of the golf courses and ranges being closed. It was very easy to set up and looks great in the back yard. I did not realize how much I would enjoy using it. Even with ranges opening up again, we will continue practicing on the net at least half of our practice time going forward. For as low cost as it is, it is really a tremendous value. I wish I had done this a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great practice net and great company to deal with
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected. Easy to setup. Hit a couple hundred balls works well. This is a great product. After a few months of use one of my poles cracked, which I could have caused by not storing properly. Amazon and Galileo Golf within one day resolved and shipped me a new pole. I have purchased three different nets prior and this is the best one I have ever purchased and less expensive than the others.
customer_reviews.author: RJT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly easy to set up. Does exactly what designed for Perfect size Left in yard during 40mph winds and because of design, air flows through it. One of best things I’ve bought on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Brad J. Bromley

customer_reviews.title: Good set up, but not durable and slightly dangerous
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with this product, however one night a cat or raccoon must have jumped on the net. When I went to put it back up, one of the fiberglass poles had split. I tried to fix it, but the sharp shards are dangerous and go right into your hand.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby M.

customer_reviews.title: Great net for your own driving range
customer_reviews.text: Once I figured out how to put it together. the reassembling took only about 15 minutes to set up. Very durable and made very well. Could use better directions for those first time setups. Other than that the net work great!!!
customer_reviews.author: HWR2

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: The target tore apart one its 1st use. Product is complete garbage. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: ben shimko

customer_reviews.title: Golf hitting net. (Revised). 5 stars for great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it does as described. My husband enjoyed using it as a golf target. The reason for the 3 star is because the edge torn easily after only 2 weeks of use.
customer_reviews.author: racteh

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Great for the back yard!!! The net was delivered with a minor defect. Galileo was more than happy to make things right and assure i was a satisfied customer. Knowing that Galileo stand by there product and costumer service goes a long way. i would definitely order from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn O'Donnell

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING TENT FOR GOLFING PRACTICE
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING TENT FOR GOLFING PRACTICE, FIT IN ANY BACK YARD, FOLD EASY EASY TO ERECT. GRAND KIDS PRACTICING GOLF WELL
customer_reviews.author: Aviva

customer_reviews.title: Very Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good net. You can hit it hard with a driver and there are no issues with it. It took 5 minutes to set up by myself.
customer_reviews.author: bud

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I was researching a good net to have indoors to swing into during these cold months. I ended up going with this Galileo Golf Net and for the price this net is GREAT! It showed up on time, it went up easy, durability / sturdiness seem great (still new so let's cross our fingers), and the seller was great (reached out to make sure I was happy and asked if I had any questions). There is absolutely no reason to spend more money than this!
customer_reviews.author: Louie S

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: We haven't tried using real golf balls yet. It's working great with practice balls.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi O

customer_reviews.title: Won't last long
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed especially for the price of it. $100 and the material rips just even getting it out the bag. Definitely not the easiest to put to gether
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B.

customer_reviews.title: Practice made perfect
customer_reviews.text: Amazing seller and great Net. A must have for the golfer who wants to become a player.
customer_reviews.author: Jyi Golf

customer_reviews.title: Target cloth not durable
customer_reviews.text: The first target lasted 2-3 weeks before developing a hole. The company was very nice in replacing it quickly free of charge. The new one lasted about 2days. My son drives the ball about290 on the golf course. He figures he hit about 30 balls before a big hole developed in the middle. I’m not asking for a new one. The target simply cannot withstand a high velocity golf ball for very long.
customer_reviews.author: Bill B.

customer_reviews.title: Updated review
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a second one after the first one ripped, and so far had great success. The key is not to stand so close to the net while hitting! Overall great value for product
customer_reviews.author: rebecca bissett

customer_reviews.title: How can I return?
customer_reviews.text: Put it together and one of the sticks broke in half before we could use it. Also the elastic rope was severed in 2 separate places when we took it out of the package.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa from Kansas

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality materials - starts to fall apart
customer_reviews.text: After just 50 or so shots the center target sheet has already disintegrated! Large tear right across it. It’s not worth spending money on something that lasts no time at all
customer_reviews.author: Megashoppa

customer_reviews.title: Sturdiness
customer_reviews.text: I have had my net for 1 week and I use it every day - I already have a hole in the target and the base - I am disappointed in the durability
customer_reviews.author: brimoo1

customer_reviews.title: Set up is a challenge
customer_reviews.text: The directions for set up are a series of photographs that are not exactly clear. It took a few tries to figure out the steps and the best way to snake the poles through the sleeves. Be prepared to repeat the set up/tear down process a few time before being able to do it in a reasonable amount of time and without frustration. Having said all of that, the finished product is great.
customer_reviews.author: alan innes

customer_reviews.title: Nice but a pain to setup & breakdown
customer_reviews.text: I like this target stand but it’s a bear to setup. The two very long poles once extended don’t easily pass through the slots. Same when dismantling.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Menzel

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Has handled every drive my husband and I have given it. The back target seems to give it longevity and is replaceable. Stores in the bag easily
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble, lightweight and works great. I originally gave this a four-star review because the target that hangs inside the net tore after about 100 shots. However, I emailed the company about this and they sent me two replacement targets within a few days. So I’m adding a star for superb customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Gregor

customer_reviews.title: Net not delivered as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware! The net I received is completely different than the net pictured. Our net has only 3 poles, is a completely different color, and the picture in the instructions is also different. I bought this for my husbands first Father’s Day- and he is unable to assemble it. I’m heartbroken that this turned into such a disaster.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Golfers home practice setup.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. You can move it from the yard to the garage with ease. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Great to practice at home.
customer_reviews.text: This product saved me a 20 minute drive to the nearest driving range and I didn't have to pay for using the range. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Horn

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed and very flimsy. Not a good choice.
customer_reviews.text: Small will not stand up to a driver. Already replaced after a week. Should never have bought it. It flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and a quality product.
customer_reviews.text: One if the bullseyes corners broke while hitting balls into the net. However, the bullseye still works with the three corners attached. I love this net and enjoy using it a lot. I did attempt to sew it back on and haven't tried it since i did so. I still recommend this net being nice and sturdy and a good size.
customer_reviews.author: Barrott Vannoy

customer_reviews.title: Great price worthy product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I use real golf balls to practice and it does a great job. Very easy to set up, and take down.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua T.

customer_reviews.title: quality products, great business
customer_reviews.text: quality product for a good price. Galileo is a great company to do business with. They made sure i received my product promptly and if i had any problems they would be there to take care of it.
customer_reviews.author: el

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: When my golf net arrived, one set of assembly rods was damaged. I emailed customer service and requested replacement rods. Not only did they respond quickly, they shipped an ENTIRE NEW golf net to me rather than just the replacement rods. And the net works great. Set it up within a half hour but now that I know how it all fits together, it should take half that time next time I need to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: MARK A BREITHAUPT

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic practice net!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great net! Easy to set up and take down by my 12 year old son. He uses it daily and absolutely LOVES it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pole splintered
customer_reviews.text: One of the poles splintered and broke during use, and now the net can’t stand up. The shattered pole was very difficult to remove from inside the net and caused splinters. There was no way to contact customer service for product support or a refund that we saw.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good deal and product.
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly in my back yard and works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Can practice anywhere and anytime
customer_reviews.text: It is really easy to put together. I didn't even need the instructions page. Since golf courses are closed, this is a very good alternative for golf players to practice. I strongly recommend this product for those who want to practice all day.
customer_reviews.author: Judy P

customer_reviews.title: Great for technique practice
customer_reviews.text: I like this for working on swing moves WITHOUT having to worry about ball flight messing with your head. Ground strike focus without direction control, for example. Works with a launch monitor for smash factor measures too. Looking forward to integrating my chipping and wedge play with it.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This net was very easy to assemble. At first I received the wrong net and their customer service was amazing. They got back to me quickly and resolved the issue. It's a very good company to work with and good products
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Item is very flimsy and not sturdy for hitting driver or long irons.
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Good product would recommend this item to my friends. Can be setup by one person with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift, but looked to be of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, looks nice!!
customer_reviews.text: Made of nice quality, easy to assemble!! Great to practice your swing without breaking something at home!!
customer_reviews.author: Juan Torres

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up and durable
customer_reviews.text: This arrived quickly and was easy to set up. It seems very durable and will last for years. The net packs neatly into a small carry bag and is easy to pack anywhere. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W,

customer_reviews.title: Not very long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I loved it for a little while, but did not last very long. Just used it to practice a little bit but started getting a holes in it just after a few usages. Kinda disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: gary

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this for a while now and really feel its great net. I've hit over 2000 balls at it and never had a problem Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Works Fine
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Re-creating its original shape for storage may be problematic as there are no instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Dave A.

customer_reviews.title: Great product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery and easy to setup. Did have a heavy wind storm and one of the poles ended up breaking. Customer service was great and replaced the whole product.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua M. Cosentino

customer_reviews.title: Extremely pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a Valentines gift for my husband and he couldn’t be more thrilled. Product looks exactly as it is shown in the photos. It even arrived sooner than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Owens

customer_reviews.title: It's a Staple in my backyard
customer_reviews.text: I love this, it is so easy to set up and take down. I actually don't take it down I just move it into my shed when I'm done. It has helped my game, I set it up, hit some balls and don't need to drive to the range.
customer_reviews.author: S. Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating set-up instruction.
customer_reviews.text: I need MORE step by step instruction on how to set up the net. I am 80 years old and I find the instruction that went with the product very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Frustrated customer.

customer_reviews.title: Practice net improves game
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, very sturdy, plenty wide and high for all types of shots
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Hinkel

customer_reviews.title: Bad net
customer_reviews.text: This net sets up fine but the durability is horrible. Had seen some spots where it frayed a bit and yesterday a ball broke straight thru. Lucky there were trees on the back side.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Great real ball hitting net!
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were so so, but there are several you tube videos that demonstrate how to assemble. This will definitely take full shots with real golf balls
customer_reviews.author: Brian Bieller

customer_reviews.title: Just not very durable
customer_reviews.text: After two previous Izzo nets which seemed to last forever, I decided to try this one. Mistake. The target becomes detached rather easily and cannot be re-attached; the netting begins sprouting holes, especially near the frame poles, (particularly driver force shots) sending balls flying through (make sure no-one is close) the floor never sits firmly on the ground and is relatively full of water after a good rain. Another reminder that less rarely equates to good. This one is going in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Jim ATL, Ga.

customer_reviews.title: Golf gift hit
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it! He can hit balls whenever now.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Secrest

customer_reviews.title: Ripped
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my son’s birthday. I thought during Covid it would give him something fun to do. After two days the backstop has an enormous rip.
customer_reviews.author: SLM

customer_reviews.title: great for indoor/outdoor practice
customer_reviews.text: If you are in withdrawal from no golf on snowy golf courses, this is the fix for you.
customer_reviews.author: teacher/nana

customer_reviews.title: Great net
customer_reviews.text: The net is great!!! Only 1 bad thing, it's not easy to put up or take down. Would buy again though
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Great item. Bought for my son-in-law and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Davis

customer_reviews.title: Don’t leave this net out
customer_reviews.text: Had this net for a year before it started to splinter. Make sure you take it down after each use.
customer_reviews.author: andy haskell

customer_reviews.text: First day I used it the entire red target ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: Good investment
customer_reviews.text: It's was a very good investment! Nice to get some practice indoors before summer!
customer_reviews.author: Joe z

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to setup and take down
customer_reviews.text: This is not a one man job, takes two or more.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Lew-koike

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT incl. mat!!!
customer_reviews.text: Net works ok. Does NOT come with a mat as ahown in pic. It’s not very useful without one...
customer_reviews.author: Eliane van Horssen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and good for kids
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup by one adult. Perfect for kids to practice their swings.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: STRONG, IT IS EASY TO ASSEMBLY AFTER A FEW TIMES AND IT WORKS TOO WITH MY RADAR. GREAT PRODUCT, THANKS
customer_reviews.author: GABRIEL

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with product. It is easy to set up and easy for travel!
customer_reviews.author: Duncan Belo

customer_reviews.text: The net is very well made and worth the money
customer_reviews.author: brenda fross

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty easy to assemble. Basically, half a tent haha
customer_reviews.text: Nice to warm up a little at home. So far, durable!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Fecteau

customer_reviews.title: Nice net
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product for golfers and kids. My 4 year old loves to hit golf balls in the net.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Great for easy set up and use in the yard
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Golf net
customer_reviews.text: Great practice net for the back yard. At first challenging to set up. We haven't even put up a tent before. would have been good practice for this. Well directions were a bit confusing. On the first set up the net would not stand. It would fall into itself. After re reading the instructions, found that you had to criss cross the poles in order to give it stability. People that put up tents would know this. Anyway, after we got the set up figured out it was great and works fine. Have to people available even if your wife just supports it while you insert poles.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Holliday

customer_reviews.title: Great netting!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome netting. I kept this little net out in the weather where it was blowing at least 30mph winds and it held down great. Hitting the balls inside was great and held every ball I hit.
customer_reviews.author: Killakim

product_meta.title: Galileo Golf Net Training Aids Hitting Practice Training Nets for Backyard Driving Range Indoor Use Golf Cage Tent Swing Training Aid with Target 10'x6.5'x6'
product_meta.description:
🏌️🏌️🏌️Tip: Our products are golf net only, excluding handsome models, green putter and driver.Thank you!
Warm tips:Galielo has never authorized distributors. If customer buy fakes from other sellers, please report them to Amazon or us in time.Thank you!
WELCOME TO GALILEO GOLF NET!
Why choose Galileo Thought Golf Net?
Golf Nets Golf Practice Net Hitting Netting for Backyard Portable Driving Range Golf Cage Indoor Golf Net Training Aids with Target
FEATURES:
Color: Black And White
Open Size: 10' (L)X6.5' (D)X6' (H) 
Weight: 8 Lbs (Net) 
Material: 150D Oxford, Iberglass Pole Dia.9.5mm 
Package Included: 1x Body Net, 2x Fiberglass Poles, 4x Ground Stakes, 1x Instruction, 1x Carrybag.
⛳️ OPEN SIZE: 10x6.5x6 ft
⛳️ CONVENIENT: Every golf net has a durable carry bag to help you storage and take easily! Fast to set up and folds away in 2-minute setup/breakdown for more practice
⛳️ APPLICATION: Use this essential piece of training equipment to practise for golf and all other ball sports in a safe environment
⛳️ STABILITY MATERIAL: Oxford, GSM Net, 11mm Fiberglass.The weight of the fiberglass support rod is one third of the traditional iron pipe. It doesn’t rust or deform.
⛳️ SELF-CONTAINED: Patented Self-Contained System,golf ball gently rolls straight down after impact without bouncing or touching the floor.
